review: Nostalgia is a great thing.Good thing i had it b4 it was p2p.Thanks bethesda. ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s

At first I thought this game was going to be another World of Tanks... God was I wrong, it was anything but. Having the information about planes and tanks gives u an insight as to how these tanks performed in combat and all the ammunition with it's speeds, explosive filler quantity, armour penetration capability. I've just been diving head first into this game and it has helped me understand what took place during the second world war A LOT more than world of tanks ever did. ♥♥♥♥ I love this game and there are some questionable 'features' but overall this game is ♥♥♥♥ing amazing10/10
Removes the need to eat irl. Social remover and eye strainer. 11/9 would lose soul again

In a world where good armour is almost no armour at all and bad armour is like wearing a reinforced steel door for armour, this game makes u reconsider female proportions and makes u wonder why you haven't been getting off to the store outfits.

This game is awesome. Gives u a good insight as to how american voice actors try sound german, scottish, Australian, russian and French, but nice try, the accents aren't that great ^_^.Anyways good game. you should download this and buy everything. :)
